name: Hedera
description:
HEDERA is a story-driven, 2D psychological horror game focused on puzzle-solving and atmosphere.

STORY

Deal with Ivy's trauma through her dreams\video-games and uncover the mystery behind the Moor family's curse.

FEATURES

  • ~3 hours long.
  • 7+endings!
  • Take pictures, dash, and shoot!
  • 15+ disturbing creatures!
  • Every puzzle and creature reflects the character's fears.

CONTROLS:
Arrows = Move

SPACE, Z or ENTER = Examine / Advance text

F4 / ALT+ENTER = Fullscreen

ESC, X = Menu / Cancel/Erase (text)
